title: The Family
occurrences: This is doctor Giordani, our family doctor. Single.
He came home from the front because of a serious family matter.
- I'm very attached to your family. - We know that. Thank you.
Today, I was ashamed of being the head of this family.
Is there a thief in this family,
- What do I care? It's your family, do as you wish. - Right.
- We aren't the intelligent ones around here. - Every family needs a dope.
She goes away, leaves a son behind, destroys her family and you're laughing!
The family should start with ourselves. One shouldn't give up one's own happiness.
Without Beatrice, our home and our family,
- It's a big family, I don't know even half of them! - Me even less!
